trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Union City
There were no other sightings in Union City on or around March 6th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw the same object that is described as a plastic bag in another report...i thought it was a plastic bag too...it moved to the east in a straight line...i saw it very close...Im very happy that someone else report it too...it seemed to float in the air...it was in front on my window when i saw it..It was like kind of rounded with a weird, rusty color...hard to described cos it looked plastic but it moved fast and in a very very straight line...the size was more or less like a basketball size...I felt in shock, i could not believe what my eyes saw....
